mutants.code:
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words(string):
    words = re.findall('\\w+', string.lower())
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] -= 1
    word_count = dict(word_count)
    return word_count

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words(string):
    words = re.findall('', string.lower())
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 1
    word_count = dict(word_count)
    return word_count

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words(string):
    words = re.findall('\\w+', string.lower())
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += 2
    word_count = dict(word_count)
    return word_count

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words(string):
    words = re.findall('\\w+', string.lower())
    word_count = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        word_count[word] += -1
    word_count = dict(word_count)
    return word_count
